mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ORDER BY RENTALDATE DESC
SELECT ID, A.BOOKTITLE AS BOOKTITLE, RENTALDATE, RETURNDATE, RETURNORNOT FROM BOOKLIST A INNER JOIN RENTAL B ON A.BOOKCODE = B.BOOKCODE WHERE ID = #{id} ORDER BY RENTALDATE DESC

SELECT ID, A.BOOKTITLE AS BOOKTITLE, RENTALDATE, RETURNDATE, RETURNORNOT FROM BOOKLIST A INNER JOIN RENTAL B ON A.BOOKCODE = B.BOOKCODE WHERE ID = #{id} AND B.RENTALDATE <= SYSDATE AND B.RETURNORNOT != 1 ORDER BY RENTALDATE DESC
mapper.insert: insert into rental values(#{id}, #{bookCode}, sysdate, sysdate+7, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: select t.bookcode, t.booktitle from (select A.BOOKCODE AS BOOKCODE, A.BOOKTITLE AS BOOKTITLE, A.PUBLISHER AS PUBLISHER, A.WRITER AS WRITER,A.IMAGE AS IMAGE, NVL(COUNT, 0) AS RENTALCOUNT FROM BOOKLIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT BOOKCODE, COUNT(bookcode) AS COUNT FROM RENTAL GROUP BY BOOKCODE) B ON A.BOOKCODE = B.BOOKCODE ORDER BY RENTALCOUNT DESC) t where rownum <=5;
